# rspacer

The goal of rspacer is to wrap the [RSpace
API](https://community.researchspace.com/public/apiDocs), that is, allow
you to use the API directly from R using convenience functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rspacer with

``` r
remotes::install_github("lacdr/rspacer")
```

## Usage

See the [Get
started](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/articles/rspacer.html) article
how to use this package.

**NB:** API Paging/rate limiting is not properly handled yet, but this
can be worked around.

# Package index

## Documents

- [`document_add_attachments()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_add_attachments.md)
  : Add attachments to existing document
- [`document_append_from_html()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_append_from_html.md)
  : Add html content to an existing RSpace document
- [`document_create_from_html()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_create_from_html.md)
  : Upload a html document to RSpace
- [`document_create_from_tabfile()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_create_from_tabfile.md)
  : Upload a tabular document to RSpace
- [`document_list_attachments()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_list_attachments.md)
  : List attachments of a structured document
- [`document_retrieve()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_retrieve.md)
  : Get document from RSpace based on document ID
- [`document_search()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/document_search.md)
  : Global search for a term

## Files

- [`file_download()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/file_download.md)
  : Download a file from the gallery
- [`file_upload()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/file_upload.md)
  : Upload a file to the gallery

## Folders

- [`folder_tree()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/folder_tree.md)
  : List contents of a folder, if no folder is specified the contents of
  the root folder will be listed.

## Utils

- [`doc_to_form_id()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/doc_to_form_id.md)
  : Get the form id used for a document

## Miscellaneous

- [`api_status()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/api_status.md)
  : Function to check availability of the API service

- [`get_api_key()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/get_api_key.md)
  : Get the RSpace API key

- [`get_api_url()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/get_api_url.md)
  : Get the RSpace API URL

- [`set_api_key()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/set_api_key.md)
  :

  Set the `RSPACE_API_KEY` environment variable

- [`set_api_url()`](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/reference/set_api_url.md)
  :

  Set the `RSPACE_API_URL` environment variable

  file](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/articles/create_document_from_table.md):

  rspacer](https://lacdr.github.io/rspacer/articles/rspacer.md):
